text: under the current administration an
unauthorized leaked to the media of
classified information is viewed as
being tantamount to aiding the enemy the
government-wide crackdown on
whistleblowers and the extension of this
crackdown two journalists threatens to
stifle the flow of information that is
vital to our our public and it's vital
for information that we not only have a
need to know but oftentimes have a right
to know the case of United States v
bradley manning is a watershed moment in
history for freedom of the press we need
to decide what freedoms and individual
rights we are willing to give up in the
name of national security after he was
sentenced we went back into the room my
myself and others were in tears because
this means a lot to us and so you get
this guy and he looks to to me and he
says it's okay it's alright don't don't
worry about it it's all right I know you
did your best it's going to be okay I'm
gonna be okay I'm going to make I'm
gonna get through this so I'm in a
position where my client is cheering me
up
